content.rendered:
We’re hiring :

Fullstack Web Programmer

Job Requirements :

  • Max. 30 years old
  • Good in PHP (Codeigniter/Laravel framework)
  • Good in MySQL/PostgreSQL Database
  • Good in basic HTML/CSS
  • Good in Javascripts/JQuery
  • Excellent in Communication and Teamwork.

Job Responsibility :

  • Develop frontend and backend web
  • Maintenance existing application

Send your cv & portfolio before 20th January 2023
to career@sevenmediatech.co.id
with subject : Fullstack_YourName

excerpt.rendered: We’re hiring : Fullstack Web Programmer Job Requirements : Job Responsibility : Send your cv & portfolio before 20th January 2023to career@sevenmediatech.co.idwith subject : Fullstack_YourName
